system.damageOrEffect: 2d10+4 X, Pen 8, Blast (1). Must make -20 Tech-Use check prior to firing to awaken missile. If suceeds, gains +10 to BS Tests to hit with missile until end of encounter. Target must reroll dodge tests made against that attack.

Qualities: Blast (1)
